headline: Palo Alto Networks is 'clearly' taking market share, analyst says
summary: Shares of Palo Alto Networks (PANW) slipped slightly on Tuesday after posting its third quarter results. Morningstar equity analyst Malik Ahmed Khan is a fan of the stock, saying the company is taking market share and "moving beyond its core firewall market into cloud security, security operations." Hear more of Khan's take on the company and other cybersecurity names he likes in the video above. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination Overtime here.
